rules_text:
Once during each of your turns, you may cast an enchantment spell you own from outside the game. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
Each creature you control that’s enchanted or is an enchantment gets +1/+1.
notes:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an Aura, an enchantment creature, and another non-Aura, noncreature enchantment, draw a card.
alt art: https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/042/478/498/large/ekaterina-chesalova-hera-small-size.jpg?1634627388
